title: How To Start An Online Business In Affiliate Marketing
headline: Learn about the fundamentals of affiliate marketing and how you can earn from it with this free online course.
description: Do you wish to generate passive income from products even if you don't have any to sell? Explore the concept of affiliate marketing and earn commissions promoting products that convert to a purchase. You'll learn the ‘5 Steps Method’, a fast and effective way to earn money as an affiliate marketer. Explore how to target an audience using social media and search engine optimisation tools to generate a high conversion rate for products.

courseDescription:
Affiliate marketing involves selling someone else's products or services to get commissions. You don't need to own a company to enter the affiliate industry. You can earn commissions directly with zero or little investment. This course will introduce you to affiliate marketing, its different forms and the top sectors that affiliates promote with their respective market share. With varieties of products to promote, it is important to choose the right one to get a substantial value for your time and effort. We will show you how to source the right product, the various product promotion methods and how to utilise these methods to boost your chosen products or services. A website is helpful for advertising products and services but it isn't significant if it does not receive visitors, often known as ‘traffic’. Study how to use different tools such as search engine optimisation (SEO), social media platforms and blogging to promote your products and the principles behind earning from affiliate offers.

Next, your tutor Sorin will show you a '5 Steps Method' for earning commission from affiliate marketing and how to set up a website to enhance your chances of success. ClickBank is a top global retailer with its own marketplace. We demonstrate how to create an account on ClickBank and have everything ready to start earning from affiliate offers available on the platform. We compare different online services that connect digital product makers with affiliates to help you decide which service to use for your product promotion. You'll learn how to harness the power of product reviews and apply the review technique outlined in this course to convince your visitors to buy products, resulting in higher conversion rates. Having learned that, we'll explore the link-building tactics and strategies that will rank your product pages higher in Google search and drive more traffic to your website.

We designed this course for learners who want to enter the online affiliate marketing business. This course is helpful for people already in the field who want to sharpen their skills and knowledge. It covers the basics of this model and requires no prerequisite understanding or experience in the area. We break down complex methods and techniques commonly employed in the affiliate business into simple and easy-to-follow steps for learners in plain language. Affiliate marketing, a multibillion-dollar industry, is a growing niche with a huge potential for earning commissions. It offers you the flexibility to choose where you want to work and what you want to promote to earn commissions. In times of global recession and a shrinking job market, affiliate marketing opens new opportunities for making a substantial amount of money to meet your needs. Join this course now and learn for free!

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: This module will introduce you to affiliate marketing and the earning potential in the field. You will learn how to select the right product and promote it to your target customers to earn commissions. Learners will be shown a five-step easy-to-follow method to promote their products using a website, search engine optimization and social media.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The main points from this module are:
    • In affiliate marketing, you promote someone else's products or services to earn a commission for every sale.
    • You can enter the affiliate industry with zero or little investment. 
    • Digital products have the highest share in affiliate marketing covering around half of the sales.
    • Clickbank is the largest digital product marketplace with over 200 million customers worldwide.
    • Search engine optimization (SEO), social media, blogging and email marketing are commonly used methods of promoting and earning from affiliate offers.
    • There is a five-step method to earn affiliate commissions that includes choosing a domain name, setting up a WordPress website, choosing an internet marketing software, creating a written review and link building.
    • You will need to use short-term SEO mostly for generating traffic to your website. 
    • You can do research for your offers using Google search, Google AdWords and YouTube.
    • To write effective product reviews for affiliate marketing, you can use the product’s sales pages and the joint venture page, request special review access from the producers and get information from demo videos.
    • Using social media platforms to get links and build authority is the key to quick SEO results and increased sales.
